== Scunizi's Favorite Packages ==

==== Graphics ====
'' Scribus '' -----
      <code>- Page layout program with export to print ready CMYK PDF's - Business Cards, Flyers, Whatever can go on paper.</code>

'' Inkscape '' -----
      <code>- Scalable Vector Graphics - that pretty much says it all. </code>

''Darktable'' -----
      <code>- Takeoff on Adobe Lightroom - Very active development photo manipulation/calogue tool for 16-24 bit space.  Non destructive editing with export to .tiff and .jpg.  RAW import for many cameras and tethered shooting as well.</code>

''Digikam '' -----
      <code>- One of the best Photo viewing, cataloging, tagging, export to Flickr and others.</code>

''Hugin Panoramic '' -----
      <code>- Panoramic Stitching program with near effortless work</code>

''Qtpfsgui'' - <code>also known as Luminance HDR</code> -----
      <code>- Create HDR images from an original pic or 3+ variable exposure pics</code>
